DOC.brief_title: Long-term Benefit Aortic Stent-graft Patients With Distal Aortic Dissection
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated distal aortic dissection Initial false lumen diameter > = 22 mm Old age ( > 75 year old ) Other comorbidity malignancy life expectancy < 5 year Complicated dissection require aortic surgery intervention Sudden death acute phase Marfan syndrome
